posts.post_title: FS: Frank Owen Sovereign 150 PSA 4 SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Selling this great Frank Owen PSA 4 with Sovereign 150 back. This card has beautiful color and registration and the centering is near perfect. Asking SOLDdelivered but will entertain offers. Paypal FF to [url]rknight1@columbus.rr.com[/url] and email with any questions. You won't be disappointed with this beauty!
